thread.title: Cape Town students break into small groups to 'confuse' police
thread.title_full: Cape Town students break into small groups to 'confuse' police | News24

author: news24.com
title: Cape Town students break into small groups to 'confuse' police
text:
Cape Town - Thousands of Cape Town students are making their way to the Waterfront where university management is believed to be meeting.
- Are you there? Send us your eyewitness accounts and photos .
News24 reporters Jenni Evans and Thulani Gqirana said groups of students took off in different directions down Darling and Plein streets, seemingly to confuse police.
Evans said police were driving through the streets looking for them as the students broke up into small groups.
